body.p: Resetting a VM is the equivalent of choosing the reset or restart option in the OS. It does not reset to factory settings or other known state, it restarts the guest OS.

To reset a VM
Open the Machines tool in , and select the running VM you want to reset.
Right-click the VM name, or open the Machine menu, and choose Reset.
Click Reset to confirm. Note that you will lose unsaved data.
